titles.title: A bill to require Amtrak to place at least 1 station agent in every State in which Amtrak operates.
Station Agent in Every Amtrak State Act
Station Agent in Every Amtrak State Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Station Agent in Every Amtrak State Act
This bill requires the National Railroad Passenger Corporation (Amtrak) to place at least one station agent in every state in which it operates.
